comments: I love the game its really fun, but the overall game progression is a super grind. I'm only on chapter 3 and I spend more time enhancing my mech with fooder, that mind you doesnt scale up with rank. The exp you have to put in goes up but not the exp you get from C to A rank mechs is pretty much the same unless it's an enhanced mech and those are super rare after the daily mission is used up.

Very fun to play and a good game but i think having to pay 300 gems as a free to play player makes it a little excessive seeing as getting a good mech and not having a free draw makes it difficult to progress seeing as it gets extremely difficult the farther in you get, like... boss level battles with normal mechs. Would like to see an easier way to draw a good mech since it isn't easy to progress but overall, it's okay.

Really impressed with the quality. Even some voice acting in it. More pervy than I expected, but makes me laugh sometimes. Only gave 4 stars because it's a gatcha type of microtransaction game, and I will never give a game like that a perfect score.

Fun at first but then it gets to the grinding moment where you need stronger suites. Some suites grant different arts so it's worth trying out new ones but that grind makes you fall behind. Would like to see maps specifically for earning up suites. As you get stronger AP points cost too much for you to redo story maps.

The last maintenance fixed the lagging issue thx for the great work  I just started playing it but my impression are positive  I think sounds takes a big cut from  game size and only one male char.  Appeared until now, overall i think it will be a big success, thx

Turn base game. The mech from C rank can easily promote to the last S rank within 3 days of grinding. Other thing that I like about this game is the Pixie's episode. I really thought I get the correct answer and they gave me a long cut scene. End up it was wrong. I was surprised. Yup there is fan service

description: Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Adventure unfolds all around your island! ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.• The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.• You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga’s Privacy Policy, found at  http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.
descriptionHTML:
Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise!

Adventure unfolds all around your island!

ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting

UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets

BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island

DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests

TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island

ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.• The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.• You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga’s Privacy Policy, found at  http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

*GET DOUBLE XP by activating an incredible new boost! Keep an eye out for the magical starfish rock appearing on your island soon!
summary: Build a farm in paradise, uncover the island story, & play with exotic animals!
title: FarmVille: Tropic Escape

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
developerAddress: Unit 04,7/F,Bright Way Tower, No.33 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

description: Play the best and most addicting bubble shooter game out there - Blaze Bubbles! Fire up and explode bubbles to overcome challenges. Join the journey and enjoy thousands of hot and exciting levels. This cool game is entirely free to download! What are you waiting for? Join the adventure today and blaze up the battle! Match, hit, and blast bubbles to reach the level target and win levels. There are thousands of incredible levels to explore, so you better get going. Win levels by shooting and popping all the bubbles until you clear the board. Play now and explore all the awesome surprises and joys this game has to offer!The amazing Blaze Bubbles shooter game features lots of hot puzzle levels, highly addictive gameplay and cool exploding graphics and effects. Join the battle, and fire up your fingers to explode and blast bubbles! This exciting adventure is free for both kids and adults to play and enjoy.How to Play- Match and burst at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the combo. - Take a shot, and pop and explode groups of bubbles to win points. - Try to beat thousands of challenging levels filled with bubbles and puzzles. - Swapping bubbles is completely free, just tap on the bubble to change its color. - Complete levels and advance along the bubble map. Solve the bubble packed puzzles and earn awesome boosts and power-ups: * Hit and pop 7 bubbles in a row to get a fireball shot that will burn every bubble on the way and cut through a pass.* Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb shot that will take out the surrounding bubbles and clear the way. PLAY AND ENJOY BLAZE BUBBLES!- Plenty of unique levels packed with awesome challenges.- Fun puzzles and brain teasers to keep you engaged for hours!- Use awesome power-ups to complete missions and win levels.- Captivating gameplay experience with plenty of blazing flames and cannons.- Completely FREE to play.This hot shooter game totally free, and 100% addicting! Join the bubble blasting fun - It’s the perfect pastime game to play when you want to relax and clear your mind! Fire up the cannon and start blazing the bubbles in your exploding journey. Do not stop until every single one is cleared, and you see flames! Start the bubble battle today!

description: Make a wish to pop all the cool, colorful bubbles, and beat all the challenges in this incredibly brilliant and addictive bubble shooter game! It’s simply impossible to stop playing this awesome game, so all you have to do is pop and pop until you drop. Experience the magic, pop bubbles, and win fabulous boosters and coins.Hop to the world of charming bubbles and magic, join the fun and experience hours of pure entertainment. Play the most addictive bubble pop game for FREE, match 3 colors and clear levels. Train your brain with this original puzzle as you blast balls online or offline - anytime! We know what you wish for!Aim, match and smash all the balls in this relaxing color-matching adventure. This incredible shooter is simple and easy to learn, perfect for both adults and kids to enjoy! There’s no time limit, so play at your own pace, relax and have a blast playing the game.FUN FEATURES: * 1000 + Exciting levels, with more added all the time. * New elements and cool graphics!* Brand new effects and sounds. * Collect awesome daily rewards and charms.* Clear obstacles and beat the challenges. * Pop 7 bubbles in a row to unlock the FIREBALL.* Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a BOMB.* Play anytime and anywhere, no WiFi or internet connection required! Get ready, take aim and shoot the balls to see the magic happening!! Earn coins while you play and use them to get cool boosters and charms. Use your logic and puzzle solving skills to complete the fun missions and clear the board, and make sure to collect special daily bonuses. How to Play Wish Bubbles:- Form a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop the combination and clear the board. - Win levels and advance along the bubble map. - You have a limited number of shots to clear a level so use them wisely and plan your moves. Play the cool and exciting Wish Bubbles bubble shooter game, Shoot and pop all the colored balls, aim carefully and hit the target! You can start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited! Get the best online color-matching app and enjoy the smooth and addicting gameplay. Hurry up and join the balloon crushing mania, but be careful - once you start popping bubbles you simply just stop!

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for MonsterCry Eternal!
Begins Epic Adventure and Ultimate Battles!

MonsterCry Eternal is a new type of game that combines card battle and RPG.
Collect cards, build decks with different strategies and evolve your cards!
Enjoy intense battles with global adventurers from all over the world through
real-time PVP, Boss Raids and more!

■■■ UPDATE NEWS ■■■

Spring has arrived at Kerkin world.
Spring season special! 7-day attendance event, new cards, and more, the richness of the enjoyment has been updated.

• Added 3 SSS+ cards and 5 SSS cards.
Build the tactical deck with new cards.

• Added new 7-day special attendance event.
Accomplish the mission and receive awesome rewards!

• Added Combined Event system.
Check out the various event information here!

• Expanded Tower of Souls: Upper Stage to 18th.

• Increased EXP rewards from World Dungeon.

• Rebalanced few SSS+ and SSS cards.

• Improvements and bug fixes.
Enjoy MonsterCry Eternal in a more comfortable condition!


Intense battle, immersion of growth, and excitement of strategy!
We invite you to the world of Monster Cry Eternal!
Check out our Facebook page!
https://www.facebook.com/OfficialMonsterCry/

*******************************************************************************

[KEY FEATURES]

★ STUNNING ILLUSTRATIONS
More than 300 fabulous and breathtaking souls!
Every card has their own unique skills. Make them your own!

★ BUILD YOUR STRATEGY, BUILD YOUR DECK
Assemble your own deck using hundreds of unique and fantastic cards with various kinds of races, classes, and skills into your own strategy.
Rule the battle with your own tactics!

★ Real Time BATTLE SYSTEM
Dominate the time! Experience the thrill of battle with split second decisions that wins or loses the game.
More depth to your strategy with each card's active time gauge!
Be smart and claim victory!

★ WORLD OF ADVENTURE
Greed and corruption always put the world into chaos...
Who will save this world?
Dozens of dungeons and hundreds of stages within an intriguing tale of adventure!
What kind of adventurer are you going to be?

Finish the battle before the time runs out!
Do not miss your turn!


[About Request permissions to access]

When you use the app, you are requesting permissions to access for provide the following services.

1. Essential access permissions
▶ Storage: Used to save downloaded game resources and game config(setting) files
▶ Audio record: Used for video recording function of PLUG (community)

[How to withdraw access permissions]
▶ Android 6.0 or higher: Go to Settings> Apps> Select Permission> Select Permission to Approve or Revoke Access Permission
▶ Under Android 6.0: Upgrade your OS ver. to revoke access or remove apps
* Your app may not offer individual access permissions, and you can revoke access in the same way.

• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.

comments: Hi,  I just started playing this game yesterday, and I am already addicted. I really enjoy the interface and the community. The game is really easy to play and enjoyable too. The only thing I would change would be in the new update with the choice of how much money you want to steal, would it be possible to place the cursor at the maximum capacity right of the bat instead of at like 30%? Personally, I want to get as much money as possible, so I have to swipe the little thingy all the way everytime, and it would be way more convenient for everybody if it was straight at the end, and then people could decide to change the amount if needed.  Thank you for you comprehension,  SimsFireball

I really like the game... my classmate come to me and tells "hey i'm a hacker look this 😂"  after this we start play the game together... I Just wanna a "Denunce App" in players desktop for denunce for somethings like abusive nicks or "The trash talkers" in system logo.

I'm in love with it.... played it for a few days now and I kinda haven't stoped stayed up until 2am and I work at 6am so yea... it's like a odd rpg with 3 class attacker, Defender and balance NO there are no classes just areas you add levels into that add exp to your over all level and also there is no level cap so come in join now and be the best hacker you can be and also there are crews

So far I'm having a great time with this game.  Its great for passing the time or if your looking for a good casual game.  Something I'd recommend would be to add some more features between the levels. A 10 level gap seems a bit empty to have nothing new.

This is an amazing concept. Ive spent all night playing and this game is so addictive, I love it.   The only thing I could suggest for this game is to add a shop where you can buy customisable options for your "phones" home screen in the app with the money you earn from hacking other players because it would add an element of user customisation into the game. But overall this is a great app and would definitely recommend!

I played HackEx and vhack xt. This game is by far one of the best hacking simulator games for Android I have played, it's got it's issues sure, but the devs work fairly quick to fix the issues and the player base from what I seen is very friendly.
description: Welcome to the World of vHackOS!Did you ever wanted to become the most famous hacker in the world?Then you should try vHack OS!Alot of fun awaits you in this highly addictive Hacking Game.- What is vHackOS?vHack OS is a Multiple Massive Online (MMO) Hacking Simulation Game, with a very fast growing community. - What would i have to do in this game?In vHackOS you need to browse the global network for other players, get access to their devices, transfer virtual money to your game account and built up your tools. But never forget about your defense! Keep in mind that there are alot of other players who will try to hack you.- What are the requirements?For this game, you will need an internet connection. Its free to play! No further knowledge required, vHackOS is easy to learn/play. Theres a community that helps you out if you have any questions or problems.You have questions/suggestions/etc? Feel free to contact us!We hope to see you soon in the World of vHackOS!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the World of vHackOS!

Did you ever wanted to become the most famous hacker in the world?
Then you should try vHack OS!
Alot of fun awaits you in this highly addictive Hacking Game.

- What is vHackOS?

vHack OS is a Multiple Massive Online (MMO) Hacking Simulation Game, with a very fast growing community.

- What would i have to do in this game?

In vHackOS you need to browse the global network for other players, get access to their devices, transfer virtual money to your game account and built up your tools. But never forget about your defense! Keep in mind that there are alot of other players who will try to hack you.

- What are the requirements?

For this game, you will need an internet connection. Its free to play! No further knowledge required, vHackOS is easy to learn/play. Theres a community that helps you out if you have any questions or problems.


You have questions/suggestions/etc? Feel free to contact us!

We hope to see you soon in the World of vHackOS!
summary: vHack OS - Start your virtual hacking career in this addicting hacker game.
title: vHackOS - Mobile Hacking Game

comments: Great game. Everything you could want in a game. Castle building, PvP. Unique equipment with special stats. Different attack types, economy classes. Rewards are rewarding enough. So far 5/5. The theme is good. The balance seems reasonable. My only suggestion is making to character limit for name changes bigger for the dwellers/subjects. Only thing I can constructively suggest. Or be able to type first and last name.

Love the concept of the game but the moment you start reaching higher castle lvl  that's when you realize that if you don't pay you will be on a long journey, ie.. PvP are out of the question everyone has minimum of 5 epic items, arena you will have to settle for 5th or less place due to power lvl difference. I am about 141000 fighting 190000 or 90000, which is not fair for those of low power or advantage to those of high.

After playing for a few hours this I find this game good my only problem is that you need to pay for those epic drops? I mean in a game if you defeated the boss those are supposed to be yours without paying, I can accept paying for 1 dollar but the second boss requires me to purchase it for almost $3 I already paid for premium I don't want to pay for other things. Please make the drops free for premium members or have them cheap or totally free, or else after my premium I'll quit this game.

I loved this game very much, I had a lot of really nice things and invested nearly $60 dollars into making my guys 5 stars and diamonds and other level up promos... I was the clan leader of the "Bananna Kings" my main complaint is my phone rebooted and now I've lost everything... my game, my victories, my clan, and all the money I invested in this great game... please help. ;( my username on my good account is "Skylark"

Loved playing the game, I just wish there was a balance in the PvP Tournaments, can't find a tournament where everyone else isn't 20000 Points over my guys. Please fix this!! Just put a bloody +/-5000 points deviation on it! Make it more enjoyable for people who don't buy everything they see

best game on mobile i think. just make sure your account is linked to your facebook and google play so you dont ever lose your account i almost lost everything when my phone broke. luckly i got it to turn on for a bit before going off and linked my accounts. now im fine..
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
recentChanges: - We are preparing Hustle Castle for a number of major updates that will include: Clan Battles, Item Enchantment, Co-op Battles, and some other new features.
- Expanded statistics at the end of a battle
- Ability to show items in the in-game chat
summary: Your castle, your rules!
title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

descriptionHTML:
Travel across the galaxy, visit other planets and shoot and pop all bubbles until you clear the board. Plan your path carefully and pop your way to victory, and enjoy over 1000 galactic levels packed with fun bubbles, awesome graphics and boosters.

Always wanted to shoot bubbles in space? Here’s your chance. Match at least three bubbles of the same color to pop the group and win levels.

Why You Will Like the Game
- Featuring over 1000 incredible levels.
- Extremely addictive.
- Fun for the whole family!

How to play
- Drag your finger to use the laser sight, and lift it to smash bubble.s
- Swap bubbles and plan your shots.
- Win all the levels by popping all the bubbles in limited shots.
- Try getting 3 stars by reaching high scores.
- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a blazing fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.
- Drop 10 bubbles or more and earn a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.

This cool game will take you to another level of fun and excitement! If you enjoy shooting and popping bubbles in a starlike atmosphere this game is perfect for you.
Play now and get the chance to crush bubbles and beat challenging levels.
Explore 1000+ levels of some serious bubble blast in this awesome futuristic adventure- it’s totally addictive.

Are you a fan of space-themed bubble shooter games?
Then hurry up and play this awesome Bubble game!
Enjoy the great bubble adventure in space!
summary: Join the elites in space, shoot cosmic bubbles & help save the galaxy!
title: Elite Bubble Shooter

description: Nach der erfolgreichen TOGGO Videos App kommt jetzt endlich die TOGGO Spiele App.IMMER WIEDER NEUE SPIELEEntdecke die TOGGO Spiele App mit vielen coolen Spielen zu deinen TOGGO Helden. Wir haben für dich unsere besten Spiele in einer App zusammengestellt. Hier findest du immer die neuesten Spiele - wie „Angelo“, „Ninjago“, „Spirit“, „Dragons“, „Alvin“, „Woozle Goozle“ und vielen mehr. KEINE IN-APP-KÄUFEDie TOGGO Spiele App wird durch Werbung finanziert und ist deshalb für dich kostenlos – sie beinhaltet keine In-App-Käufe. Damit die App nicht viel Speicherplatz verbraucht, werden die Spiele online gestreamt. Die App kann nur mit einer Internet-Verbindung genutzt werden. Wir empfehlen unsere App mit einer Wifi-Verbindung zu benutzen, damit keine Kosten über deinen Mobilfunkanbieter anfallen.MEHR TOGGOAußerdem kannst du in der App nachschauen, welche Serie gerade im Fernsehen läuft. descriptionHTML:
Nach der erfolgreichen TOGGO Videos App kommt jetzt endlich die TOGGO Spiele App.

IMMER WIEDER NEUE SPIELE
Entdecke die TOGGO Spiele App mit vielen coolen Spielen zu deinen TOGGO Helden. Wir haben für dich unsere besten Spiele in einer App zusammengestellt. Hier findest du immer die neuesten Spiele - wie „Angelo“, „Ninjago“, „Spirit“, „Dragons“, „Alvin“, „Woozle Goozle“ und vielen mehr.

KEINE IN-APP-KÄUFE
Die TOGGO Spiele App wird durch Werbung finanziert und ist deshalb für dich kostenlos – sie beinhaltet keine In-App-Käufe. Damit die App nicht viel Speicherplatz verbraucht, werden die Spiele online gestreamt. Die App kann nur mit einer Internet-Verbindung genutzt werden. Wir empfehlen unsere App mit einer Wifi-Verbindung zu benutzen, damit keine Kosten über deinen Mobilfunkanbieter anfallen.

MEHR TOGGO
Außerdem kannst du in der App nachschauen, welche Serie gerade im Fernsehen läuft. Du findest das aktuelle Fernsehprogramm von TOGGO und TOGGO plus.
Im Serien-Bereich kannst du dir deine eigene Liste mit deinen Lieblingsserien zusammenstellen. So bekommst du schneller als alle anderen mit, wenn wir ein neues Spiel in die App hinzufügen.

Bitte beachte, dass die App für aktuelle Versionen der jeweiligen Betriebssysteme optimiert ist. Bei Problemen wende dich gerne an unseren Support.

Informationen zum Datenschutz und unseren AGB findest du auf: www.toggo.de/rechtliches/index-864.htm

Bei Problemen mit der App sende uns gerne eine E-Mail an: kontakt@superrtl.de.

Weitere Informationen zu TOGGO findest du auf http://www.toggo.de

comments: This season I really put in a big effort to try and win the treble. Got the best players, do all the training, strategy ect. All for nothing. Lost against a crappy team in semi of Cup. Apparently according to IA it wasn't my day. Like I said before, game is pre programmed. Dev's do nothing about the gameplay, they rather concentrate on silly add ons which can make them money. Big boooooooooo for dev's.

Playing the game for more than 2 years. The simulation is good, and you don't necessarily need to invest money or much time to develop a good team, 5 mins/day is enough time. I see though a very big minus one the match play algorithm. You can have a very good team and yet lose games against really weaker teams. That adds to the gameplay I guess, but losing twice (cup) or losing against teams that are more than 30% weaker than you, certainly is wrong. The situation didn't change, 1 star and uninstall.

I think it is the BEST FOOTBALL MANAGING game i have ever played.  But you should make some changes,like as tikitaka,counter attack,long ball  ext. These will be helpful for us.we need more tactis. Thank yiu for your wonderful game.

I am playing the game for 1year now and I think you have to increase the percentage of the players when they rest for 3hrs... I think 6% is not enough specially when we have 2 games per day (league and cup or champions league), because after the game, they still have to have two training sessions and they get too tired, with no time to recover at least 50 of condition for the next match, so from ther we have no manage well by leadind "easy sesseions" and player do not develop as they should. For me the time of recovery is fine, but the points conceived are to low... at least 10% in each 3hrs. Hope you get my point. The app is 👌 I love it

In overall it's a good game but needs some changes.  The match engine is not so good .  Like promotion to next division , also should be a relegated team from that division to a lower division.  Prices are outstanding. Tokens are a problem.  But i insist AGAİN that SYSTEM DİVİSİON needs a new update or review. PUT AT LEAST A TEAM THAT SHOULD GET RELEGATED TO A LOWER DİVİSİON.  The idea that you have to change the whole team every season is also not a good thing. Some little changes are needed to make this game a wonderful game.

I thought it was a good game with well designed system. But it starts disappointing me when i realize no way to get the token with no money. Thus, this game is suitable for you guys who have too much money to spent

description: Doctor Hippy likes to cure animals! Her ambulance is always ready for a call, where surgeon or vet are needed. All best games for boys and girls where player could find hospital, games, where you need to save, cure and help, all of them are collected to the series of games Game Doctor Surgeon Hippo. If you like kind games about hospital and interesting games about doctor, then a new exciting game Doctor surgeon Hippo is created especially for you.To cure animals is as interesting and exciting as to cure people. Hospital is a big and interesting place. Games about hospital and games about doctors teach us different important knowledge and skills. Hospital simulator allows to learn how to make vaccination safely, to make operations and save patients, who need urgent and complicated operations. Surgery is a very responsible and complicated task. Doctor surgeon learns in a medical school and visits hospital as an intern for a long period of time, before he could make operations. But our Hospital simulator allows to skip many years of studying and try to make vaccinations right now. Try to save patients and make safe operations right now! And if you like it, you could go to study in a medical school. And after studying you could cure people in real life!Doctor Hippo surgeon needs help! Without your help, Hippo ambulance can't cure the animals of Hippo town. We need a vet urgently. Be a part of our team, now you are a surgeon doctor! All games for boys and girls from the series Game Doctor Surgeon and games Hospital of Hippo town are absolutely for free.

descriptionHTML:
‼️ATTENTION‼️ OUR PROJECT IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT. PLEASE TAKE THIS INTO ACCOUNT WHEN LEAVING COMMENTS AND RATINGS.

Pixel's Unknown Battle Ground
Do you like military blocky pixel games? Try to survive on crazy pixel battle arena after apocalypse in the block city! Jump out of the survival plane on the dead island, find the best loot, kill the enemies. BUT be afraid of the shrinking zone, it does significant damage! Shoot with AK, pixel gun, smg, multiple-barrel and other weapons. BE THE LAST lone survivor!
Make your own pixel block story. Fight for the end of deathmatch in our 3D shooter!
You don’t need to 7 days to die, you might be killed in one minute in our pixel games! Because it could be your the last day on earth, be very carefully with dead zone it moves very fast and can easily eat you.

Features:

✪ Squads
Fantastic team battle! Team deathmatch with your warfriends to the bitter end.

✪ Skins for every taste
Skins looks absolutely perfect, just like in true 3D fortnite block city survival games, you can purchase any pixel block strike skins;

✪ Graphics settings for the weak phones
Our pixel shooter with full HD graphics and also you can make low setting if you have a weak phone;

✪ More than 30 types of weapons
Huge military arsenal such as AK, minigun, sniper guns, pixel gun, smg, pistols and so on. Start the end of the world, JUST SHOOT with pixle gun!

✪ In-game auto
Of course we have battle cars or combat vehicles and even we have a TANK! Stay unturned with our vast pixel world block strike game! Deliver your block force as fast as it possible, and hide yourself from dead zone!

✪ Live chat
Communicate with other players in block city! We have created a live chat, try to find friends or teammates which will help you implement the strategy to victory pixel combat!

✪ Auto shooting
You don’t need to push a shot button, all you have to do is just to pixel combat and prop hunt. We’re hoping that vainglory its not about you, do not spare anyone!

✪ Massive map size
Grand map size, that’s what we have, it’s surrounded by the mountains and fortnite dead zone. Big radiation island this is the place where you have to survive while you plaiyng in the block city. We have more than 20+ players in the same map in the multiplayer online shooter!

✪ Easy, intuitive control
Just chill! You will not notice how hours and dayz will fly by while you playing the pixel shooter.

Improve your fighting skills with our pixel war game, figure out with you enemy or you will be in pixel dead.

Pixel's Unknown Battle Ground is the world’s first pixelated survival fortnite genre first person multiplayer shooter on mobile devices!
One of the best survival game with pixel world. Battle royale online shooter will not let you get bored!
Our multiplayer game is absolutely free online game for download.

ROYAL BATTLE, FORTNITE and PIXEL WARFARE HAVE ALREADY STARTED!

Pixel Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/PixelsBattleGround/
Tech support: support@azurgames.com
summary: BATTLE ROYALE multiplayer survival simulator!
title: PIXEL'S UNKNOWN BATTLE GROUND

comments: This game would be ok and quite fun. Yet the HUD is just an eyesore. If the game didnt have all the ad added HUD then it would be tolerable. Yet the gameplay isnt best, its descent just not fluent. I would have fun playing, but the hug headache of accidentally hitting facebook or any other icon that sends you to playstore is just a nousence of irritations.

Its a nice take on a Undead type of build-a-base type strategy game. Wish there was more people that played but that will come with time I'm sure. I'm still pretty early into the game so I haven't really unlocked a lot of features yet. I think the colors are splendid but the actual Artwork or graphics could still be improved on. Gameplay is pretty slow at first but grows gradually as you play more. I would like to see less ads unless there's a paid version to remove them altogether. Also watching ads could actually reward better reduced timers on buildings and other such things in my opinion. Out of 5 stars, I give it a 3 1/2 to a 4. Not bad but,  there's lots of room for improvements here. Keep the game updated and listen to your viewers & this game's rating and gameplay will improve with time. Not a bad job overall Developers.

Fun,  could be better when base gets attacked. If you're not playing everyday. You miss out on the ability to counter attack. Having to click all the collectors iskind of annoying. Playing a different game, click one and done.
Am so pissed at this game right now! Downloaded it to my new phone and my original town has vanished and been replaced with a beginners one!!! Don't waste your money on this game!!!

Invested a lot of time in the game and switched phones and i had to start everything all over. For that reason alone i have to give it low marks. Outside of that i did enjoy playing it while killing some time.
Good game but takes so long to  upgrade things.. got far on it then asked me to connect to Facebook which I did and it took me back to the start absolutely fed up now as was enjoying the game

description: Welcome to Bubble Town, where the fun never ends!Shoot and pop bubbles all around the city and earn coins. Play this addictive online game for FREE and enjoy thousands of exciting levels filled with amazing boosters and surprises. Explore the bubbling metropolis and crush all the colorful balls to move on to the next exciting challenge. Bubble Town is a fun bubble popper game for kids and adults to enjoy.BUBBLE TOWN FEATURES:* Plenty of fun levels filled with puzzles and challenges. * Awesome free gifts!* Powerful boosters that will help you pass levels.* Addictive gameplay.* Free to play and super fun!* Play with family and friends and see who can build a winning strategy!* Pop and drop bubbles and clear the board. Hurry up and install this fun game and start working on your matching skills! Join the incredible adventure, and solve thousands of amazing levels full of awesome elements and puzzles. Explore the bubble city and complete the different missions and challenges. Play everywhere, anywhere and as much as you want. No wifi connection is needed. The longer you play, the more addicted you’ll get! How to Play* Drag your finger to move the laser sight.* Release your finger to take a shot. * Shoot bubbles all around the village and earn coins. * Match 3 or more bubble of the same color to pop the combo and win points. * Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will take out the surrounding bubbles.* Pop 7 bubbles in a row and to get a fireball that will cut through a pass. * Overcome the obstacles and reach high scores. * See which color you are getting next and work out a strategy to smash all bubbles using fewer shots.  * Put your strategy skills to the test.  * Enjoy plenty of well-designed levels, cool graphics and designs. Download for free and discover the bubble shooting extreme fun. Thanks for playing and enjoy the game!

comments: Rough Start, but Gets Better Each time you play the Single Player mode, you start out with the same kinds of questions. These questions pertain to "finishing the phrase," "naming what these two primary colors make," "what nursery rhyme is this from," etc. As you progress, the questions start to become more general. This makes the game more challenging and gives one an incentive to keep getting "richer" so to speak. The downfall comes when you consistently miss questions. This forces you to return to the repetitive beginning.
It's a good game.. good choice of questions. Not too many ads. I would have rated 5 stars, but my only problem is, once you reach the top, there is no where else to go besides restart

TRICKY You might think this is too easy but the more you play, the harder it gets. I enjoy this game and it has become quite addictive. I love the sound effects, keeps you on your toes. It's a gr8 app, play where ever you are. Fun. Fun.

Tests your knowledge This game is really cool. Tests your knowledge and requires on-the-spot thinking. Only drawback is that once you log in to facebook, all highscores are deleted and nothing is saved.
Needs one thing Less repeating of overly easy questions like hickory dickory doc the ____ ran up the clock...or Mary had a little_____. REALLY?
Great app! This is one of favorites for trivia. The question change so you aren't able to memorize them easily. You do have 3 lifelines. I give this 5 stars and I've tried about 15 trivia apps.
description: "Who becomes rich" is a classical multiplechoice trivia quiz game, where you have to answer questions like you know it from TV Quizshows. You can choose between three lifelines. This is a game that will test your trivial knowledge and education. You can also compete with your friends over a highscore (maybe one of you can become a millionaire in one of the tv or radio shows). Your private pub quiz.We have so far hundereds of questions about topics like: General knowledge, Sports, Movies, Politics, Geography, Biology, Computer Science, Mathematics, ...Every player can add questions by simply submitting them via an ingame submitter. After being reviewed they are going to be added to the database. We are working on translations to other languages. If you want to participate, don't hesitate to write us an email.You can use the facebook connection to share scores with friends (howabout a little quizduell?)Like our Facebook page:https://www.facebook.com/whobecomesrichNeeded permissions:Full network access & view network connections:This permission is used to communicate with the user (feedback, new questions) as well displaying advertisements.Read battery statistics:The battery-permission is used by our new advertisement network in Germany in order to show relevant ads according to the batery status. We are currently changing to a high quality adnetwork. In future we want to show less but more relevant ads.
descriptionHTML:
"Who becomes rich" is a classical multiplechoice trivia quiz game, where you have to answer questions like you know it from TV Quizshows. You can choose between three lifelines. This is a game that will test your trivial knowledge and education. You can also compete with your friends over a highscore (maybe one of you can become a millionaire in one of the tv or radio shows). Your private pub quiz.

We have so far hundereds of questions about topics like: General knowledge, Sports, Movies, Politics, Geography, Biology, Computer Science, Mathematics, ...
Every player can add questions by simply submitting them via an ingame submitter. After being reviewed they are going to be added to the database.

We are working on translations to other languages. If you want to participate, don't hesitate to write us an email.
You can use the facebook connection to share scores with friends (howabout a little quizduell?)

Like our Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/whobecomesrich

Needed permissions:
Full network access & view network connections:
This permission is used to communicate with the user (feedback, new questions) as well displaying advertisements.

Read battery statistics:
The battery-permission is used by our new advertisement network in Germany in order to show relevant ads according to the batery status. We are currently changing to a high quality adnetwork. In future we want to show less but more relevant ads.
summary: Answer interesting questions and compete with your friends.
title: Who Becomes Rich (Trivia Quiz)

description: Car Simulator 2018 offers 31 UNLOCKED cars available to drive, drift or race in the open world city, highway or desert. This is the best car simulator game with realistic physics engine.You can turn on or off the steering assistances such as ABS (Anti-lock Braking System), ESP (Electronic Stability Program), TCS (Traction Control System) and SH (Steering Helper).You can also adjust the Maximum Speed, Maximum Brake and Maximum Torque of each super fast car!Choose the traction type that you like: front wheel drive (FWD), rear wheel drive (RWD) or all-wheel-drive (AWD) and take the cars off-road for an excitement ride. An off-road car for driving on hills and to simulate 4x4 traction. Top Features- 31 amazing cars to drive- Real physics engine game- Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows- Controllable car behavior: simulator, racing, arcade, drift, fun and custom.- Full HD graphics- Real HUD Camera- Car damage- Open World Environment- offline game- free game without wifi
descriptionHTML:
Car Simulator 2018 offers 31 UNLOCKED cars available to drive, drift or race in the open world city, highway or desert. This is the best car simulator game with realistic physics engine.

You can turn on or off the steering assistances such as ABS (Anti-lock Braking System), ESP (Electronic Stability Program), TCS (Traction Control System) and SH (Steering Helper).

You can also adjust the Maximum Speed, Maximum Brake and Maximum Torque of each super fast car!

Choose the traction type that you like: front wheel drive (FWD), rear wheel drive (RWD) or all-wheel-drive (AWD) and take the cars off-road for an excitement ride. An off-road car for driving on hills and to simulate 4x4 traction.

comments: Enjoyed the game. Very fun and im actually spending which is rare for me.   I dont like the orb prices go up with each new arena. I wont be spending now im in in arena 4 those prices are just not worth it. Id also like the ability to save a few different decks. And make gold earning a bit easier its not balanced. Im in arena 4 and been saving gold for over a week not spending on anything opening orbs. And i still cant upgrade any of my cards.   Tbh as much as i enjoy the game. If i cant upgrade without spendig then ill wind up uninstalling eventually

Love it! Very interesting and fun to play, but i have a suggestion. You should add some spells (Poison, Heal...). They don't have to be overpowered, just for slightly more fun gameplay! Also they should be regular cards (Heroes). And one more thing: bring some advatage to players that don't start first in the match, because it's easier to win when you are playing first.

Very unique and fun strategy game. Easy to understand from the first game. Very forgiving to newcomers but if you want to get good, it takes planning and learning. Fun to pick up and play throughout the day. My only problem is that if you sit and play for more than a few minutes, you'll waste alot of orbs winning games. You can spend gems to free up slots, but I'd rather just not receive orbs until I have a free slot. Good game.

I wish that your global rank was more intuitive and less complicated to acquire. Also on the achievement's it says that I can't get the last 2 stars on the found heroes however I have all that I can get. I also wish there was a pm option as the leader of a clan I want to give constructive criticism but not call them out in the chat.. other than that it fully deserved the 5 star.. thanks for makeing this and keep smashing!!😋

The game itself its good, but lack of fun. To upgrade cards you need money which is hard to get in the game and from the clan. In free chest and common orbs you never get any rare cards and money is too less. Would be fun if the cards could be developed faster and if they would have a counter attack possibility when you upgrade it to certain level. You could implement a coop when each plyer choose 2 cards from deck or something similar. In addition I would change which player starts, should be based on the deck strenght. I would also implement the position of the cards on the field and which card is in front and which card in the back, by that you need to start a bit more strategic. Hope that something happens with the gameplay soon, before more players leave. Good luck

Love the game. Really fun to play and balanced so even non paying players can do well. One complaint I have is the new addition of zombie has a bug, when hitting a buffed opponent the poison touch doesnt replace the buff. Please fix this issue.

comments: Love it! Sure, it has auto battle and auto guide for missions, but it can be turned off if you are really picky about that. It has much more choices in class, and highly customizable.   There is a bunch of other awesome features that you don't even need to spend money on, so I myself would recommend this game to those who like this sort of thing!   Thanks developers, you're awesome!

Servers seem to be stabilizing so I'm going to change my 1 star review to 3. This game would have been great if they used the same graphics as the story. In this day and age developers have made huge leaps forward in the department and this game doesn't show it. Its jam packed with things to do, customization and other things. If they update the graphics this game would be the masterpiece that it needs to be!

Doesn't seem to work on my mobile data? I don't have high-speed, but other MMORPGs work perfectly fine on average speed. I get the error message "Server Connection Lost (0)-1" or something every time I load it, and have yet to get farther than the loading screen (where the current event pop-up comes on, after the download loading screen.) I was really looking forward to playing. If I can get the app to work (going to try online tomorrow!), I'll happily change my review! I'd really like this to work on my data, though; I don't have wifi at home.

Fantastic game it takes some time to get used to the camera angles (It would be even better if you could rotate the camera around your character, it improves the atmosphere). Combat is ... Well it takes time to get used to that too that could use some improvements. Character design is good I like it Story is good also (Still progressing). Overall great game few small updates and changes will make it a even better game.

This game is amazing. Ignore all the server reviews, I've been playing since it came out and worst I've gotten is some lag. Fully animated cutscenes with your created character. An intriguing story you usually don't get with these types of games. Upgrading is steamlined to help the player out and you never waste anything because your exp transfers. descriptionHTML:
ACHIEVEMENTS
● Recommended by Google Play in many countries
● 18 million downloads for Aura Kingdom Online worldwide!
● Addictive gameplay with visually stunning graphics and animation effects

BACKGROUND
Come and venture into this massive Aura Kingdom world, a classic online game transformed into mobile platform.

In Aura Kingdom, players become Envoys who were summoned by the Goddess of Creation, Gaia. To fight the dark power and protect the world “Azuria”, players must stand together, and collect powerful Eidolons to save the world.
Sky Tower, the ultimate challenge of all; numerous bosses await you to conquer, fight your way up to the 100 epic levels.

CLASSIC FEATURES
● Easy to manipulate: designed to be easy for everyone to pick up.
● Summon over 100 heroes called Eidolons to assemble your ultimate troop, and save the world from eternal darkness. Also, you will find the interaction with them makes your day.
● Sky tower 100 levels: Real-time battles with those fearsome guardian bosses in Sky Tower. Team-up with guild members and win incredible rewards in return.
● Exciting Battles to challenge: 1 vs 1 arena, Tag Team Tournament, Raid Instances, GVG Tournament Duels and various PVE trial instances.
● Hundreds of gorgeous outfits and styles to choose from. Japanese style, Western fantasy, sportswear and daily fashion keeps players up with new trends. Costume Archive system offers players not only excitement but also a way to enhance power.
● Multiple fun for character stats boost: Envoy’s Path for passive skill abilities, Mounts Refinement, Eidolon Collection, Card Collection and Card Battles.
● Other interesting features like Fishing, Cooking, Mining and Treasure Hunt and more!

description: ☠️   In this dynamic and frightening thriller, you have to investigate the mysterious things happening in your neighbor's house.  Beware! What you can find in the basement of his home can be too frightening. Your neighbor is a dangerous person and does not tolerate incursions, so beware of him! Avoid all the traps and video cameras with which his home is crammed, and find out what terrible things he does there!☠ ️ The gameplay is an interactive quest, where you yourself will be the main character!  The camera with a first-person view perfectly conveys the atmosphere, so the game will be very realistic. The plot at first seems uncomplicated - you just moved into a new house and now want to meet a new neighbors from the house opposite. However, this is not so easy. The neighbor turns out to be a closed and unsociable person, whose house is always locked in a dozen castles. To that the yard of his house is completely covered with traps, video cameras and other traps. Strong sounds, like the screams of horror coming from his home from time to time, also frighten him terribly. To top it off, you often notice how a neighbor game digs some pits in his yard. Obviously, something mysterious and terrible is happening. Your task is to overcome your fear and figure out what's wrong!☠️  You have to sneak into the house of a terrible neighbor, bypassing all of its traps and surveillance cameras.  But not just cameras need to be afraid! The neighbor himself is a dangerous person, and he certainly will not tolerate an invasion of his home. Act as secretly as possible and remain unnoticed - otherwise you will not be able to leave the neighbor's house alive!Get to the truth and do not let the neighbor commit new evil deeds!
descriptionHTML:

Avoid all the traps and video cameras with which his home is crammed, and find out what terrible things he does there!

☠ ️ The gameplay is an interactive quest, where you yourself will be the main character! The camera with a first-person view perfectly conveys the atmosphere, so the game will be very realistic. The plot at first seems uncomplicated - you just moved into a new house and now want to meet a new neighbors from the house opposite. However, this is not so easy. The neighbor turns out to be a closed and unsociable person, whose house is always locked in a dozen castles. To that the yard of his house is completely covered with traps, video cameras and other traps. Strong sounds, like the screams of horror coming from his home from time to time, also frighten him terribly. To top it off, you often notice how a neighbor game digs some pits in his yard. Obviously, something mysterious and terrible is happening. Your task is to overcome your fear and figure out what's wrong!

☠️ You have to sneak into the house of a terrible neighbor, bypassing all of its traps and surveillance cameras. But not just cameras need to be afraid! The neighbor himself is a dangerous person, and he certainly will not tolerate an invasion of his home. Act as secretly as possible and remain unnoticed - otherwise you will not be able to leave the neighbor's house alive!


Get to the truth and do not let the neighbor commit new evil deeds!
summary: Watch your awful neighbor and uncover his secret!
title: Demonic Neighbor

description: Mensch is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907 or 1908.The game was issued in 1914 and sold about 70 million copies, driven by huge popularity among German troops serving in World War I It is a cross and circle game with the circle collapsed onto the cross, similar to the Indian game Pachisi, the Colombian game Parqués, the American games Parcheesi, Aggravation, and Trouble, and the English game Ludo.
descriptionHTML:
Mensch is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907 or 1908.

The game was issued in 1914 and sold about 70 million copies, driven by huge popularity among German troops serving in World War I It is a cross and circle game with the circle collapsed onto the cross, similar to the Indian game Pachisi, the Colombian game Parqués, the American games Parcheesi, Aggravation, and Trouble, and the English game Ludo.
summary: Ludo is a board game developed in Germany by Josef Friedrich Schmidt in 1907
title: Ludo

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.

This game will cheat you! I  upgraded a bunch of my characters but the next time I logged in nothing had saved! The funds I used to upgrade were also gone, of course. Don't waste money buying anything because the upgrades you make just disappear.

Let your app data be backed up... My old phone has to be replaced and after a lot of work everything was still not saved. I feel this is a pretty simple thing to have included and a dumb thing to leave out. Fail. Thanks for taking my money and running.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
recentChanges: Various bug fixes and performance optimizations.
summary: Be a manager or surgeon and build a hospital in this realistic surgery game!
title: Operate Now: Hospital

comments: I do not like the new update where tackling recharge has been reduced. I think what it was on before was a lot better and made the game a lot more strategic as you had to time your tackles perfectly. I think reduced recharge should be something you can win in the boxes or buy with the money or gems. Another good idea could be to give the team that's just scored 20 seconds of quicker tackling on the back of the goal they have just scored. Please put it back to the normal tackling rate! I am addicted 😂😁

The game is simply awesome in a word. The mesmerizing music combined with excellent commentary makes me nostalgic to the time when FT first released Score World Goals. Playing the game is a very smooth experience, in addition to the pleasure from the quality of the graphics. There are some minor problems in gameplay, but these don't matter that much as the game excels with the idea, execution and result. And of course, it is a game where losing creates no frustration. Thanks to FT for providing us this masterpiece.

Fun game, as the Score! Games usually are. Nice player system, solid multiplayer experience. But some changes need to be made: Tackling system needs revision. Need to be able to select tackler or cancel tackle. Far too much challenging from behind. Need to have tackle ready straight from kickoff, twice now I've conceded from kickoff because I had no tackle.  Players need to hold formation much better too. Higher levels with faster players easily get up the pitch in the break with no one around to defend.

Love the reduced tackling. It feels more like a high pressing Premier league match now and actually gives you a chance to stop the better teams. With the slower tackling, one missed time tackle deep in your opponents half can result in  them getting the ball all the way to your penalty box and scoring. All the while your players just hover around doing nothing. Keep the reduced tackle time!

Honestly so angry, you go on a small losing streak and end up not being able to play a game due to not having enough nomey, so I spend £10 of in app purchases thinking it will sort me out, lose once and again I can't afford to play. Don't download money snatching pile of tosh

The fast rechargeable tackles should be removed.  The game is no fun now. Earlier I had to time my tackle perfectly so that I don't give away second balls. And same with the attack. I tried to get tackled in an area where I can win second ball. But now this fast tackle recharge has just ruined the game.

description: 2048 Original will take you to roots of the original number puzzle game!This 2048 Original puzzle game is not an ordinary one. Upgraded version of the original 2048 puzzle game:1st Upgrade: In addition to classic (4x4) board size, You will find small (3x3), big (5x5), bigger (6x6), and huge (8x8) board sizes.2nd Upgrade: You will have the chance to take your last move back: “Undo button” Tutorial:»Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles.»When two tiles with the same number touch each other, they merge into one number which is sum of those two numbers. (2+2=4, 4+4=8, 8+8=16,…., 1024+1024= 2048) Merged numbers can still be merged with other tiles with same numbers. »If you reach the 2048 tile, you win!»Do not let the board be full of tiles. If there is no empty spot on the board or two adjacent tiles with the same number which can merge into one, Game is over!2048 Original puzzle game is a marvelous harmony of puzzle games: Logic Puzzle Game, Math Puzzle Game, Classic Number Game.This 2048 puzzle game is free and always will be so.People from all ages can play the 2048 Original puzzle game: adults, teenagers and kids.High Scores button will take you to Leaderboard in which you compete with others to climb in the rankings.Do not forget: To be able to access the Leaderboard, you need to sign in your google play games account.-FEATURES-⁂Game will not end with reaching the 2048. You can go beyond up to 131072. Push your limits! ⁂Classic (4x4), small (3x3), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) grids!⁂High score will be automatically saved if you exceed previous one.⁂One Undo move:  You can undo your last move and get back to one move earlier position.⁂Simplistic UI.⁂Leaderboard is available for all grid sizes. Do not confine yourself to just one grid. Taste the others...2048 Original puzzle game was developed as a native android app that makes the 2048 Original puzzle game app work flawlessly in all android devices.
descriptionHTML:
2048 Original will take you to roots of the original number puzzle game!

This 2048 Original puzzle game is not an ordinary one. Upgraded version of the original 2048 puzzle game:
1st Upgrade: In addition to classic (4x4) board size, You will find small (3x3), big (5x5), bigger (6x6), and huge (8x8) board sizes.
2nd Upgrade: You will have the chance to take your last move back: “Undo button”

Tutorial:

»Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles.
»When two tiles with the same number touch each other, they merge into one number which is sum of those two numbers. (2+2=4, 4+4=8, 8+8=16,…., 1024+1024= 2048) Merged numbers can still be merged with other tiles with same numbers.
»If you reach the 2048 tile, you win!
»Do not let the board be full of tiles. If there is no empty spot on the board or two adjacent tiles with the same number which can merge into one, Game is over!

2048 Original puzzle game is a marvelous harmony of puzzle games: Logic Puzzle Game, Math Puzzle Game, Classic Number Game.

This 2048 puzzle game is free and always will be so.

People from all ages can play the 2048 Original puzzle game: adults, teenagers and kids.

High Scores button will take you to Leaderboard in which you compete with others to climb in the rankings.

Do not forget: To be able to access the Leaderboard, you need to sign in your google play games account.

-FEATURES-

⁂Game will not end with reaching the 2048. You can go beyond up to 131072. Push your limits!
⁂Classic (4x4), small (3x3), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) grids!
⁂High score will be automatically saved if you exceed previous one.
⁂One Undo move: You can undo your last move and get back to one move earlier position.
⁂Simplistic UI.
⁂Leaderboard is available for all grid sizes. Do not confine yourself to just one grid. Taste the others...

2048 Original puzzle game was developed as a native android app that makes the 2048 Original puzzle game app work flawlessly in all android devices.
recentChanges: Remove ads purchase problem has fixed
summary: Back to the Roots of 2048 Game - Best 2048 Puzzle Game Ever- Swipe and make 2048
title: 2048 Original

description: Are you brave enough to take the Demolition Car Stunts 3D challenge and skilled enough to master it? 100 way to destroy the muscle car in Danger stimulating stunt arena! Who doesn't love the thrill that comes with performing serious stunts? Complete the impossible stunts with your Muscle Car. Start your heavy engine and explore extremely unique stunts tracks in this adventure 3D game. Ambitious 3D graphics, realistic vehicle physics, excellent environments are waiting you. Let’s beat the world record jump.Drive your racing car in the thrilling stunt adventure!The wild and crazy fantasy stunts city will blow your mind! Modern stunt environment, awesome car smashing machines and mechanized techno based obstacles. Perform high jumps on colossal ramps; accelerate through fiery hoops; jimmy through deadly propellers; knock down and smash all types of obstacles. Dash and race through the stunt city at lightning fast speed displaying cool tricks!Take your air stunt with nitrous motor car. Smash the dangerous air race with other Muscle car racers and beat heavy wheels records in Extreme city of stunts. Using turbo nitro engine, enjoy rapid nitro power. Tap a nitro button to boost stunt car speed, tap to make nitro flames.Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city!You'll experience realistic car damage, try smashing your muscle, sports and classic carz into obstacles, crashing into walls and flipping by jumping of huge stunt ramps to see full body damage. With our latest extreme car destruction simulator, speed off the biggest jumps, perform the fastest drifts, and zoom to top speeds in our latest exciting game.Here is the best action packed car stunts game to fulfil your moto drifting dreams. It will be a big challenge for all city drivers with the most extreme impossible ramp aligned in a very tricky way.Features of Extreme Car Stunts Classic - Demolition Wreckfast :Different Vehicles (Sports cars , classic cars , muscle cars, 4x4 cars)Most challenging car stuntBiggest impossible Ramp everLatest Mega Ramp game seriesMonster Trucks on airCrazy unsafe tracks in the skySmooth and easy controls of drivingEngaging GameplayYou will get felling of a real stunt rider by playing this extreme stunt car racing tracks simulator games choose your 4x4 car among various vehicle with realistic physics. To perform crazy stunt fasten your seat belt and give full race to your stunt car till it is in the air, but try not to fall down the impossible tracks otherwise you will lose the impossible games. Now dare to be fearless stuntman and drive the stunt car on deadly and impossible tracks in the impossible game. In this impossible game you needs special training as jump high in the sky by doing mid air ramp stunt. Car Stunts on Impossible Tracks is a new experience precision driving simulation for your amazing adventure.  Enjoy the thrill of exciting difficult curvy tracks more challenging then climbing the hill.
