descriptionHTML:
Are you on spring break? Bring your friends together and join extremely risky hill climb sledding! Explore icy road tracks and enjoy this snowmobile simulator game! Control your snowmobile and improve snow racing skills. Win this arctic race and prove that you are the best snow racer.

FAST SNOWMOBILES

Are you a big fan of snow motocross game? Then try to overcome all levels of this risky motocross game! All snowmobiles are well crafted and ready for snow racing. Choose one of your favorite snowmobile: Ruby, Ginger, Viper or Silver Fox and start hill climb sledding! Turn spring break in to the real adventure!

ENVIRONMENT

Prepare to race in extreme arctic conditions. Try to overcome one snow racer after another. Watch out for local penguins and explosive obstacles! Play this snowmobile simulator game, smash all ice balls and win the race! Have a great time during this year spring break.

MISSION

The mission of this snow motocross game is very simple - win the snow racing championship! You have to control your snowmobile as professional snow racer! Do not panic while making hill climb sledding stunts! Drive your mountain sled and enjoy the race!

CONTROLS

Become the snow racer as you always wanted to be. Keep mountain climb sledding and enjoy this fun snowmobile simulator! Enjoy spring break and play this snow motocross game as long as you want.

◆ Ready, set, GO with the orange button. Make your snow bike or mountain sled move as fast as possible.
◆ Use ARROW buttons to make crazy stunts, front and back flips.
◆ Come back everyday to COLLECT COINS. Use them to get a new snow bike or mountain sled and unlock new worlds.
◆ Race in 2 WORLDS: North Pole and Ice Land.


WHAT TO EXPECT:

◆ Intense snow racing
◆ Smooth gameplay
◆ Simple controls
◆ Adorable snow bikes
◆ Breath-taking racing moments

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Snowmobile simulator is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy snow bike or mountain sled ride IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

MINI GAMES

Need a short break from winter motocross game? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.

NOTICE
This snow bike game is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.

◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆

Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Our company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search Tiny Lab Games on the app store and discover even more fun games!

Learn more about Tiny Lab Games and contact us at the following:

WEBSITE: http://www.tinylabkids.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TinyLabKids
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TinyLabKids
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/TinyLabKids
POPJAM: TinyLabKids
EMAIL: support@tinylabproductions.com

description: Ever dreamed of becoming a Blood Test Doctor in Hospital? Make your dreams come true with Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator! Where you can experience being a Blood Test Injection Doctor in hospital full of crazy doctor, cure patient or use all your skills to perform the surgery simulator in Blood Test Doctor Hospital! Apply injection simulator to patient Arm & buttock and collect blood samples in test tubes to test diabetes & other Infection disease. Start Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator with patient’s IV before going to emergency hospital surgery room for surgery simulator. Become an emergency blood test emergency doctor in hospital simulator, start understanding hospital emergency medicine and methods along with IV fluids injection. The Er Emergency Hospital is crowded with patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only doctor at the hospital who is going to treat the patient. Collect blood sample, test blood and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, the patient can recover quickly. Insert cannula on patient hand to let the medicine get into his body quickly. A needle prick may cause slight bleeding from patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab.Practice your injection skills on sick patient in this Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator game. There might be inexperienced nurses & er emergency doctor who cause pain while injecting medicine with injection simulator. Get to the surgery simulator hospital now and attend your patient coming in er emergency ambulance. The poor patient have painful expressions and a fear in their pretty little eyes. Treat them with all the doctor tools and injection simulator at the er emergency surgery hospital. First you have to rub some numbing cotton over the area of body on where the injection simulator syringe needs to be put. From there you will take the blood test and other injection simulator tasks, be careful when you prick a needle. Apply an antiseptic cream with a cotton swab to avoid any bleeding from patient skin.Features:* Amazing injection simulator surgery games.* Draw blood from patients vein with injection.* Collect blood sample and test it with a microscope.* Send the blood sample to the hospital laboratory.* Use ER emergency doctor tools & injection to save lives in hospital.* Practice emergency surgery steps to perform surgery simulator.* Treat serious injuries on patients in ER emergency hospital surgery room.

Your main mission in this dinosaur hunting adventure free game is to hunt down the dino as the best jungle sniper of 2018 but watch out for attacking predators as they are roaming freely in the forest! Kill them all if needed.
So don’t hold back, grip your Launcher tightly, take a perfect aim, test your sniper shooter skills as a real dino hunting expert and don't let them escape. Experience grand sniper shooting in the real jungle wilderness environment as a real hero and win this hunting challenge.

Experience Grenade throwing, Archery shooting and in ancient mode you can kill dino with sword, shield and bow in this dinosaur hunter free game.

If you love playing animal shooting and dino hunting games then dinosaur hunter free is for you as it gives you a chance of dino hunting and hunting wild creatures in grand exotic forest environment and will let you become the dinosaur hunting pro hero of 2018. Your trust on assault rifle skills will come handy while your hunt. Dinosaur Hunter Free gives you an amazing experience with real 3D graphics, engaging sound effect, the best dino hunting ground and driving red jeep and crushing dinos.

Keep in the mind dinosaurs are dangerous and attack you and you have to kill them as soon as possible may be they will not be killed with one bullet because of their big size.
if you are a real hunter they go and pick assault rifle of you choice and start hunting.

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's a vary good game so hood i can't believe it's on mobile game! Also the game mechanics are so amazing as well. Then there's series of things you have to do that keeps you in the game for a long time; the theme and music fit the atmosphere, and there's not much of a problem with the game either. "This game gives me goosebumps!" (From Dashigames aka Dachi) he loves it as well too. #goodgamemakemore

I love this game, especially when you hide just in time and there's that tense moment wondering if she saw you. I get chills down my spine when I'm hiding and I hear her saying "I see you". If I could, I would give this game 100 stars. I would suggest having a mode after you beat Granny to become Granny because I think it would be cool to chase the player around the house. Also, I think the game would benefit from a much bigger house, more drawers and of course, more locks. Love the game, keep up the good work.

Realy fun i could play this game FOREVERRRR!!!!!! without even deleting it. its realy a chilling game though. Could you add a granny mode that you play as the granny and do whatever i want like: kill my grandkid, just watch my grandkid escape, and, or jumscare my grandkid. That would make it more fun and funny oh, and also could you make when i tranculize granny she won't dessapear and, make an animation where she stands up after she is tranculized that would be cool😊😊😊😊😊😀😀😀😀

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ 😃👍

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

description: New MC Stories Snow enjoy a new, vicious, bandit, winter shooter in 2018! The plot of the game attracts saturation missions, the local police trying not to notice dealers and gangsters everywhere! Your goal is to get out of the local cops-clueless, to destroy the small gangs, to head the clandestine cartel and at the same time stay unnoticed before FBI.Features:· Exciting simulator of  life;· Play with the open world;· You do not have to follow missions, you can riot all over the city;· Improved graphical models of characters, cars, buildings;Get the full list of the privileges of this boss of the mafia passing the story line of missions, skate on stolen cars or buy new ones from the showroom (though when you have a virtual M16 rifle, car dealers give cars themselves, without money). Do not forget about the revenge of local gansters from whom You selected the flows of trafficking, can hire a couple and then only a sniper rifle is able to resolve such a difficult matter with the hunt for You! We hope for your support, leave comments on Google Play. Your opinion is important to us for further improvement!
descriptionHTML:
New MC Stories Snow enjoy a new, vicious, bandit, winter shooter in 2018! The plot of the game attracts saturation missions, the local police trying not to notice dealers and gangsters everywhere! Your goal is to get out of the local cops-clueless, to destroy the small gangs, to head the clandestine cartel and at the same time stay unnoticed before FBI.

Features:
· Exciting simulator of life;
· Play with the open world;
· You do not have to follow missions, you can riot all over the city;
· Improved graphical models of characters, cars, buildings;

Get the full list of the privileges of this boss of the mafia passing the story line of missions, skate on stolen cars or buy new ones from the showroom (though when you have a virtual M16 rifle, car dealers give cars themselves, without money). Do not forget about the revenge of local gansters from whom You selected the flows of trafficking, can hire a couple and then only a sniper rifle is able to resolve such a difficult matter with the hunt for You! We hope for your support, leave comments on Google Play. Your opinion is important to us for further improvement!
summary: New MC Stories Snow enjoy a new, vicious, bandit, winter shooter in 2018!
title: New Mad Stories Town Snow Edition 2018

Invite entertaining guests to stay, earn money and upgrade your hotel in this incremental clicker game!

Love pets? Want to build the most awesome pet hotel? In this idle management game, you will be breaking records in caring for cute animals like cats, dogs, guinea pigs, and racoons! Invite your friends as bloggers to visit your hotel, keep playing to discover more!

If you have tired from farming, garden caring, home decorating then try this incremental clicker strategy. Spend a couple of minutes each day while you are idle to have fun!

- ENDLESS GROWTH - Automate your hotel and earn continuously while you are away in this incremental game!

The game may ask for permissions to access media files and device's location. These permissions are required by ad networks and analytics service providers. We do not control them. If you are unhappy with this permissions just deny them when prompted.

Just spend 5 minutes a day to get tons of fun! Let us share our incremental clicker love with Pets Hotel!

comments: Really great gamplay, graphics, amazing controls which mind you are much more responsive than Sonic Dash or at least I think so, and this is the best concept I've ever seen. It's like Sonic Dash and a racing Sonic game had a baby. Best of all, this game captures the essence of Sonic in a brilliant way. Another thing I'd like to say is it's super balanced(besides Cream shes cheap as hell) but the fact is no character is better than the other cause they all have something unique about themselves.

The game is super choppy! I dont have a bad phone or Wi-Fi so I dont know the problem. If there was a mode like where you can reduce graphics that would be amazing. Besides that the rest is fine. Getting characters is easy, ads plays when after a match and/or if you want to double your rewards, and looks pretty nice.

I like it, really cool game, you never really know what's going to happen in a race. If you guys are making yet another character to race with, Im asking: can it please be Infinite, Big the 🐱, or our own custom character? Also, are you able to make different racing music in the game? I have a feeling that some people will get annoyed if the same "Lost Valley" song is being played over and over again.

This game is fun and amazing but at times, it gets boring. More levels and modes need to be added and new players need more chances to get emerald or plantinum chest. For some reason, a file wasnt working at and the game won't load. Plus, it won't let me sign in to Google play. Other than that its a good game.

I was enjoying the game but I started getting put against level 8's and 9's as a level 2.  Losing two races would take away 6 or 7  second place wins in a row, worth of progress.  I would lose 15-20 minutes worth of progress in two races. Wasting my time and effort.  Sometimes I swipe up to jump and my character just spin dashes instead, so my character just slams into an object or spins into a hole. Annoying.  After trying again and losing all gains in two losses, uninstalled.  Waste of time.
Great idea, but overall still needs work. My major dislike is I have turned off music and sfx in the settings, yet when I'm hit by someone my phone still plays the crashing noise VERY LOUDLY.

description: Before you - one of the strangest and crazy creations in the history of video games. The essence of the game is a kind of version of rock climbing, but you almost immediately make sure that there is no essence in it at all. All you can do is tirelessly getting over it climb up with a hammer on rocks, trees, buildings and rubbish. Warn immediately straight away - it's very difficult and, most likely, nothing but anger and frustration, you will not achieve it, so better go and do something useful. If it does not stop you, then getting over it forward to new heights!Your game character is an ordinary bald guy, quite content with his life. Well, maybe not quite ordinary - instead of legs he has a cast iron pot, and he is armed with a climby hammer. In short, this is the strangest hero that imagination can come up with. This unusual chopper is able to push off from the ground with his hammer and cling to them for protrusions, thereby paving his way upward. Do not wait for something else - in this game you can only getting over it climb up. What for? Few managed to find out how the game ends ...  Features:🔨 Climb upwards with the help of a hammer and a boiler (nothing else can be done here);🔨 Our philosophical reflections on the futility of being sounding on the background (after your next insulting getting over it fall it will be very useful);🔨 There is only one continuous level in the game (although we are not sure if it can be passed);🔨 Loss of all progress after one mistake (you just fall to the bottom, but there are no checkpoints here);🔨 Excellent training for your nervous system (if you are in a fit of rage do not throw your device into the wall at the very beginning); 🔨 If you still succeed in some miracle of reaching the climby hammer summit, you will receive incredible glory and honor!
descriptionHTML:
Before you - one of the strangest and crazy creations in the history of video games. The essence of the game is a kind of version of rock climbing, but you almost immediately make sure that there is no essence in it at all. All you can do is tirelessly getting over it climb up with a hammer on rocks, trees, buildings and rubbish. Warn immediately straight away - it's very difficult and, most likely, nothing but anger and frustration, you will not achieve it, so better go and do something useful. If it does not stop you, then getting over it forward to new heights!

Your game character is an ordinary bald guy, quite content with his life. Well, maybe not quite ordinary - instead of legs he has a cast iron pot, and he is armed with a climby hammer. In short, this is the strangest hero that imagination can come up with. This unusual chopper is able to push off from the ground with his hammer and cling to them for protrusions, thereby paving his way upward. Do not wait for something else - in this game you can only getting over it climb up. What for? Few managed to find out how the game ends ...


Features:

🔨 Climb upwards with the help of a hammer and a boiler (nothing else can be done here);

🔨 Our philosophical reflections on the futility of being sounding on the background (after your next insulting getting over it fall it will be very useful);

🔨 There is only one continuous level in the game (although we are not sure if it can be passed);

🔨 Loss of all progress after one mistake (you just fall to the bottom, but there are no checkpoints here);

🔨 Excellent training for your nervous system (if you are in a fit of rage do not throw your device into the wall at the very beginning);

🔨 If you still succeed in some miracle of reaching the climby hammer summit, you will receive incredible glory and honor!
developer: Volcano of Getting Over it Games
summary: Know the new degrees of frustration, climbing to the heights!
title: Getting Over Here Ascent

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

The game itself is fabulous. Cute farm. Good graphics. Good work on that front. Yet being a bit more generous with westbucks in game or making some things more payable with your coins. I get that games don't create themself. But I personally am more likely to pay for games you can actually play for a bit after doing a purchase. And I don't really get that feeling here. But none the less the game itself is a work of art 😊

description: Heavy Duty Tractor: Simulator Farm Builder Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer who intends to grow crops on his fields.  Each of the exciting levels will test your driving skills and your ability to handle heavy cargo while driving up hill on hilly road. In the process of growing crops farmer needs a tractor to drive. You need to have really good off road hill climb skills so that the drive is easy. After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. This farming tractor game is hard driving game there is a risk of impossible fall down from steep hills and dangerous mountains. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. As a best farmer you are a designated driver to transport cargo in the valley of Seattle hills and village farm. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. In this ultimate farming real chained tractor driving cargo diversion you will begin to influence the ground to prepare and with the cultivator you can accomplish this. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it.  The user needs to deliver goods items in this transport simulation as the user will take cargo items and crops to the city while driving on the offroad tracks. The user also take the animals and deliver these animals, take the tractor uphill and drive the tractor on Narrow Roads.	Let us explore some amazing features:🚜      Realistic graphics.🚜      Hill climb & Mud drive.🚜      4x4 off road faming tractors.🚜      Open world Village and offroad tracks.🚜      Dynamic 360 camera angles.🚜      Variety of camera views.🚜      Smooth and easy controls.🚜      Multiple controller scheme.🚜      Tilt, steering and button control.🚜      Motion sensor and tilt sensor integration.🚜      Sensitive tilt controls.🚜      Specialized Physics engine.🚜      Weather engine.🚜      Farmer Tractor and Cargo Tractor🚜      Open World sound effects (SFX).🚜      Variety of visual effects (VFX).
descriptionHTML:

Each of the exciting levels will test your driving skills and your ability to handle heavy cargo while driving up hill on hilly road. In the process of growing crops farmer needs a tractor to drive. You need to have really good off road hill climb skills so that the drive is easy. After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. This farming tractor game is hard driving game there is a risk of impossible fall down from steep hills and dangerous mountains. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. As a best farmer you are a designated driver to transport cargo in the valley of Seattle hills and village farm. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides.
In this ultimate farming real chained tractor driving cargo diversion you will begin to influence the ground to prepare and with the cultivator you can accomplish this. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. description: Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun  or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!

Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.

Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.

It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.

description: The Survival Hunter Games 2 is a blockbuster hit loaded with new and even better features! Download today and experience for yourself one of the best first person shooter games available on the market! ✲✲✲GAME STORY✲✲✲We are an advanced civilization. One that has survived, and even thrived from the apocalypse. We are a world with many technical and otherworldly advances that boast the ability to open portals to other dimensions. This was done in order to study the effects of different consequences and alternate reality. It seemed to be safe enough, with all the safety precautions that were taken, but then the unthinkable happened. After the sustainment system failed during a massive power outage, the safety shield that kept the portal from being accessed by either side was lowered, and the vacuum ripped several agents from their stations, trapping them in these alternate dimensions...As one of these agents sucked inside the portal, you are now trapped in a dimension where the world is drastically different, and all because of a choice made by a handful of men several millennia ago. This world is a treacherous place filled with dangers at every turn. You must remain alive in this bleak world until help can reach you... IF help can reach you.✲✲✲GAME PLAY✲✲✲The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!Features:-User friendly interface with touch pad controls-Timers-Power-ups-Ammo and weapon collection-Jump, aim and run-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes-Mission orders-Hand-to-hand combat
descriptionHTML:
The Survival Hunter Games 2 is a blockbuster hit loaded with new and even better features! Download today and experience for yourself one of the best first person shooter games available on the market!


✲✲✲GAME STORY✲✲✲
We are an advanced civilization. One that has survived, and even thrived from the apocalypse. We are a world with many technical and otherworldly advances that boast the ability to open portals to other dimensions. This was done in order to study the effects of different consequences and alternate reality. It seemed to be safe enough, with all the safety precautions that were taken, but then the unthinkable happened.

After the sustainment system failed during a massive power outage, the safety shield that kept the portal from being accessed by either side was lowered, and the vacuum ripped several agents from their stations, trapping them in these alternate dimensions...

As one of these agents sucked inside the portal, you are now trapped in a dimension where the world is drastically different, and all because of a choice made by a handful of men several millennia ago. This world is a treacherous place filled with dangers at every turn. You must remain alive in this bleak world until help can reach you... IF help can reach you.

✲✲✲GAME PLAY✲✲✲
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more!

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage.

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon.

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat
summary: Your mission is to survive and kill every enemy you come in contact with
title: The Survival Hunter Games 2

comments: Homescapes is an awesome game, combining the relaxation (and frustration!) of match 3 games with the joy of renovating a fabulous mansion. Throw in the fascinating story line, lovable characters lovely music and stunning graphics (except the kitchen wallpaper lol), I'll be playing this for a long time! I'm working on the living room right now, getting close to level 800! Thank you Playrix!

The renovations of the mansion are fun.  To earn stars to do reno or buy stuff is difficult.  I am at level 24 and after 3 days I can not pass it. The fact that we have a limited number of moves makes it very difficult8, if not impossible.  This way it is oriented for younger players, with faster reflexes not players of all ages or will slower actions. Please improves this feature of the games, make it more accessible to earn stars. In fact I sometimes need help from my grand sons to complete certain challenges. I am now at level 115 but my first comments are still valid.  I am going forward but I still find the games difficult.  It would be great to have other types of ways to earn stars.

Love it! I'm stuck on this one level and it takes forever to get lives! (Free😁) Loving the game more and more. But we need more booster chances. I still like the game, I even cheat on Toy Blast with it! Im a huge fan of being able to rotate the booster. Need more moves availble please, on most levels it's just not enough.

It is fun and addictive. One thing I would suggest is when a player pays to play make the puzzle less difficult to pass. Other wise the coins will be gone to quickly and no one wants to constantly put more money into a game that just eats it away.

Keep to the remodeling. don't need all the other stuff. Also winning a games should be valued higher with additional coins granted. Takes too long to get stars. Not spending any money on a game. To get coins is too much real money.  THIS GAME IS WAY TOO EXPENSIVE.  You are probably aware I am buying less and less coins and I will continue to decrease purchases until I spend no money on your games.  This includes your landscape game.  You people are greedy pigs!!  Your mother should be ashamed of you.

You know, I've been on level 495 for a week and I can't get pass it. I even used boosters and it doesn't work. What am I doing wrong? This game is awesome and I have enjoyed opening up NEW levels . Finally I opened the upstairs! YEAH!

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

comments: This game is good for the brain.  It challenges you to think as you progress, as most games would, though this game seems to really do it. It tests reaction speed and processing time, which is healthy. The music is also not distracting to those who enjoy calming background music. I enjoy this game. It gets five stars from me.  I wonder if I'll get to four nots…  I'll find out after this review.

Lots of enjoyment out of the game.  Its super good to keep you on your toes.  Cut down on the amount of ads though.  I don't want to see one every time I either go through a level or lose on one.  Makes it feel like I'm doing more of watching ads than actual game play.  Will give more stars when they are.

This game is beautiful. It has easy controls and a fun little graphic that could have easily been just a turning block for movement. It gets challenging pretty quickly and doesn't let up. A really big problem I have is when it asks me to continue. I can watch an ad to continue. If I chose not to watch the ad to continue, it will then proceed to show me an ad; and that really irks me. What is the point? Easily a five star game that is held back by constant obtrusive ads. The price to remove ads isn't terrible, but because of the current position, I'm hesitant to pay.

It is a really good game.  It does kinda mess with your brain.  But in a positive way.  The challengs are extremely complex.  When you get to the harder difficulties.  That requires more consideration and patience.  But other than that its a great game.  I think you should increase the duration period by an extra 10 seconds.  It might give people who are new to this game a better understanding on the impact of the challenges.

Amazing, fast-paced game. I love it! 2/3 through the game so far, all gold boxes! (except endless modes) Edit: this game makes you build such a hatred for it by throwing you puzzles you can't solve in a second and a half (or so). Yet it's so well done and addicting you cannot stop playing. Well played, developers. Edit 2: My hatred is reinforced with the last 3 stages, the Liar. I hate you and love you for making this game, devs.
It's actually fun, I just have so many other games that make me think that I just don't play it often.. but it's truly a great download if you like the brain teaser type of games.
description: Ready to push the limits of your Brain?Not Not puzzle game is the ultimate brain-busting challenge based on logic and orientation. Follow the written instructions to swipe your character towards the correct direction (up, down, left or right) and victory. As you reach higher levels in the game, increasingly complex and varied instructions will require use of both your logic and dexterity for you to succeed. description: From the creators of Airport Scanner comes the sequel, Airport Scanner 2!  This super addicting luggage scanning game now has a brand new 3D gameplay experience and a Player versus Player smuggling game!Work your way through over 100 missions at 50 airports across the US. Build your rank by stopping the bad guys from bringing bad things through security while still getting the flights out on time! Stay on top of ever changing rules and regulations, while working at busier and busier airports.Use your X-RAY scanner to look through carry-on luggage and find the prohibited items. Your scanner is equipped with a high-tech 3D exploded view that lets you really get in there and see what’s in the bags. If that’s not enough, you can also equip your scanner with an arsenal of handy power-ups that can help you handle even the craziest bags.This time around there are also smugglers! These sneaky passengers will try to smuggle a valuable collectable past your scanner in the midst of the frantic action. If you find the collectable you get to add it to your collection and the smuggler will join your team! Then you can then send your new smuggler to another player’s airport and help you build your collection of collectables!  Just pack the collectable into in a bag and send it to a friend or random opponent and hopefully they wont find it! Can you find or smuggle every collectable in the game?FEATURES * New 3D exploded view scanning mode.* Multiple viewing angles just like real X-RAY scanners.* Smuggle collectable items past your friends for an extra reward in the new PvP gameplay! * Find 100+ rare collectable items.* 50 airports with multiple missions means hours of enjoyment.* Real TSA Prohibited and Allowed Items.  * Fully Upgradable X-RAY Scanner with power-ups.* Line management - fast track first class passengers and get flight crew on their flights with just one tap!* Line management Rewards – collect coins and upgrades for successfully completing line management. game.* Lots of brain-bending rule variations that keep you on your toes.ADDITIONAL FEATURES * Challenge your friends by trying to smuggle collectables by them.* 3D baggage screening and beautiful graphics.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Airport Scanner comes the sequel, Airport Scanner 2! This super addicting luggage scanning game now has a brand new 3D gameplay experience and a Player versus Player smuggling game!

Work your way through over 100 missions at 50 airports across the US. Build your rank by stopping the bad guys from bringing bad things through security while still getting the flights out on time! Stay on top of ever changing rules and regulations, while working at busier and busier airports.

Use your X-RAY scanner to look through carry-on luggage and find the prohibited items. Your scanner is equipped with a high-tech 3D exploded view that lets you really get in there and see what’s in the bags. If that’s not enough, you can also equip your scanner with an arsenal of handy power-ups that can help you handle even the craziest bags.

This time around there are also smugglers! These sneaky passengers will try to smuggle a valuable collectable past your scanner in the midst of the frantic action. If you find the collectable you get to add it to your collection and the smuggler will join your team! Then you can then send your new smuggler to another player’s airport and help you build your collection of collectables! Just pack the collectable into in a bag and send it to a friend or random opponent and hopefully they wont find it! Can you find or smuggle every collectable in the game?


FEATURES
* New 3D exploded view scanning mode.
* Multiple viewing angles just like real X-RAY scanners.
* Smuggle collectable items past your friends for an extra reward in the new PvP gameplay!
* Find 100+ rare collectable items.
* 50 airports with multiple missions means hours of enjoyment.
* Real TSA Prohibited and Allowed Items.
* Fully Upgradable X-RAY Scanner with power-ups.
* Line management - fast track first class passengers and get flight crew on their flights with just one tap!
* Line management Rewards – collect coins and upgrades for successfully completing line management. game.
* Lots of brain-bending rule variations that keep you on your toes.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
* Challenge your friends by trying to smuggle collectables by them.
* 3D baggage screening and beautiful graphics.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and game tweaks, PVP improvements.
summary: Airport Scanner 2, now in 3D
title: Airport Scanner 2

description: Grim Defender - Castle & Tower DefenseGrim Defender is a fast paced castle defense / tower defense (td) game that requires strategy and skill. You defend against waves of attacking monsters, upgrade your defense and grow stronger and stronger. The dark army is preparing an attack - fight back with powerful crossbows, magic spells, traps, legendaries and modules - send the monsters back to the dungeon where they came from!Tap the screen to shoot monsters, drag and drop spells on monsters or position powerful traps. Use gold, rubies and darkgold that you collect from monsters to upgrade your defense and weapons! This addicting defense game is praised for its diversity, depth and fun gameplay - enjoy large action loaded battles with hundreds of enemies on the battlefield.Endless levels, tons of upgrades, items, legendaries and infinite combinations!Challenging gameplay through never ending levels and different game modes. Craft and customize your defense as you like. Non-linear defense and upgrade setup, hundreds of viable builds. Freely combine items to build the strongest defense, place explosives, lightning or stasis traps to destroy your enemies or maze up using palisades. Use fire, ice, lightning or pushback spells as well as powerful crossbows combined with modules to stop the dark monsters. Upgrade your bow to shoot stronger arrows, improve your modules to deal more damage, use multishot or have splintershot. Upgrade your castle wall, buy more defense turrets and magic towers or even add an automatic turret to your castle!Lots of unique enemies, crazy monsters and bosses!Fight your way from easy zombies and skeletons to cannons, palisades and powerful epic boss monsters - can you defeat the ultimate dragon? Kill all monsters and become the greatest warrior in this crazy game!Dailies, quests and global competitions with other players!See how other players defend their castle and compete in the global leaderboard! Play dailies and quests or compete in the ultimate versus mode battle against other players (player versus player (pvp) - coming soon). Reach the highest rank in the online competitive leaderboard - have the highest level of all players or become a vs mode machine with the best defender strategy!Offline play!Grim Defender does not require an internet connection to be played - play offline from anywhere and whenever you want.Download now for free (free to play) and become the greatest monster defender in the best action packed wave based castle defense / tower defense game that you have ever played!Game website: http://www.grimdefender.comCompany website: http://www.byteghoul.comWe love defense games and made this game with a lot of passion and focus on details! We really hope that you enjoy our work!BYTEGHOUL GAMES
descriptionHTML:
Grim Defender - Castle & Tower Defense

Grim Defender is a fast paced castle defense / tower defense (td) game that requires strategy and skill. You defend against waves of attacking monsters, upgrade your defense and grow stronger and stronger. The dark army is preparing an attack - fight back with powerful crossbows, magic spells, traps, legendaries and modules - send the monsters back to the dungeon where they came from!

Tap the screen to shoot monsters, drag and drop spells on monsters or position powerful traps. Use gold, rubies and darkgold that you collect from monsters to upgrade your defense and weapons! This addicting defense game is praised for its diversity, depth and fun gameplay - enjoy large action loaded battles with hundreds of enemies on the battlefield.

Endless levels, tons of upgrades, items, legendaries and infinite combinations!

Challenging gameplay through never ending levels and different game modes. Craft and customize your defense as you like. Non-linear defense and upgrade setup, hundreds of viable builds. Freely combine items to build the strongest defense, place explosives, lightning or stasis traps to destroy your enemies or maze up using palisades. Use fire, ice, lightning or pushback spells as well as powerful crossbows combined with modules to stop the dark monsters. Upgrade your bow to shoot stronger arrows, improve your modules to deal more damage, use multishot or have splintershot. Upgrade your castle wall, buy more defense turrets and magic towers or even add an automatic turret to your castle!

Lots of unique enemies, crazy monsters and bosses!

Fight your way from easy zombies and skeletons to cannons, palisades and powerful epic boss monsters - can you defeat the ultimate dragon? Kill all monsters and become the greatest warrior in this crazy game!

Dailies, quests and global competitions with other players!

See how other players defend their castle and compete in the global leaderboard! Play dailies and quests or compete in the ultimate versus mode battle against other players (player versus player (pvp) - coming soon). Reach the highest rank in the online competitive leaderboard - have the highest level of all players or become a vs mode machine with the best defender strategy!

Offline play!

Grim Defender does not require an internet connection to be played - play offline from anywhere and whenever you want.

Download now for free (free to play) and become the greatest monster defender in the best action packed wave based castle defense / tower defense game that you have ever played!

Game website: http://www.grimdefender.com
Company website: http://www.byteghoul.com

We love defense games and made this game with a lot of passion and focus on details! We really hope that you enjoy our work!

comments: Great game. Just finished playing. I really enjoy these games from big fish 4 friends games, but it be a shame that they are far and few between. It would be better if hey could be a bit more quicker on h development side of the with these games if possible, as long as he games are not compromised in an expect for graphics or game play. I admit that I am really looking forward to the next installment of Living Legends. Give this game not only the 🌟 but give it five 👍 too.

Living Legends Beasts of Bremen. So far it's interesting. I have only started playing the game. I will be back when finished. I have to say this was a great game! Loved everything about it especially the puzzles, morphing, and Collections. This is one of the better companies they really put together a very good game.

I started playing it but after awhile I had to get out of it. I went to go play it again and it won't go to the game it goes to the app store. I will have to uninstall. Fix your games big fish if you want people to give a review they have to be able to get in to play the fame

Loved it! So glad to have a new selection from big fish that was so entertaining. Although I have to say, I felt sorry for the villain in this one. But I really enjoyed the twist of familiar fairy tales. I hope more like this are in the works.

The game was good. Using nursery rhymes with a developers twist makes for a fun game. A few things did bother me a bit though. I could be wrong but the old man didn't play the contrabass. Right? The bonus chapter made no sense to me. She gets the dolls from the prince to use against the town but can't unless she's dead?

I really enjoyed this game. Fantastic graphics and attention to detail. Mini games not too challenging but occasionally that is a good thing! I don't usually bother with collectables but I did here because of the information contained in each scene of what was available. Clever interweaving of the Musicians of Bremen and Rapunzel fairy tales. More please!!

comments: HaHaa! I have hijacked my partners phone just to play this game! Burger shop 1 AND 2 are the best games out there! Clear graphics, smart humor, goofy characters...just a lot of fun! Kristen C.

I always liked games like this, now that this has different foods, makes it more interesting to play. I don't mind the ads, as long as I can play the game. I will however continue to play until I can get the full version which will be soon. Staying on my phone.

I have played the first game 'burger shop' long time ago using my PC.. And i love it (thankfully, i found the game here in playstore-while playing the game it bring back old memories 😊)  so I am super excited when I bump into the 2nd version.. So far I am in love with the game, still keeping the same format from the original one but adding new food choice and new customer.. Thanks to the developer.. I am really hoping if you guys can come up with the 3rd..

DIDN'T THINK IT COULD GET BETTER!!!! Thought nothing would beat burger shop one.... So wrong. I started this and completed all of story mode with three stars in a couple of hours. ADDICTED!!! Going to complete the rest!

I love this game. It's a great time killer. The only feature I don't really care for is the flicking feature because I can click something to grab it but it flicks it instead and does things I don't want to but other than that, it's great.
This was my favorite game on the pc. I literally have played this thru so many times and never got bored. So happy to play on my tab. Bring on burger shop 3 please!
description: In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened. Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain. Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!GAME FEATURES:• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!• Over 100 different food items! • Over 100 trophies to collect! • Unlimited play!Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!GAME MODES:• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress.   Customers are infinitely patient.• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master?  Put your food-making skills to the test!Available in 11 languages:  English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.
descriptionHTML:
In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened.

Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain.

Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!

GAME FEATURES:
• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!
• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
• Over 100 different food items!
• Over 100 trophies to collect!
• Unlimited play!

Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!

GAME MODES:

• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.

• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!

• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress. Customers are infinitely patient.

• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master? Put your food-making skills to the test!


Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.

GoBit Games
Suite 149
6523 California Ave SW
Seattle, WA  98136

description: لعبة تجهيز الصبايا لحلفة الزفاف من أجمل العاب صبايا بنات، عليكي اختيار صبية صبية لتجهيزها لحفلة الزفاف، عليكي أن تضعي المكياج وبعدها عليكي أن تلبسي الصبية أجمل اللباس، لتكون جاهز لليلة الزفاف، في اللعبة يوجد عدد من الصبايا وكل صبية لها عدة مراحل لذلك لن تشعري بالملل من اللعبة.حاولنا في هذه اللعبة تجميع كل العاب حفلات الزفاف في لعبة واحدة، فمثلاً قمنا بتجميع لعبة التجهيز لحفل الزفاف و لعبة التجهيز لحفلة الزفاف 2018، لعبة تجهيز حفل الزفاف و العاب التجهيز لحفل الزفاف و لعبة تجهيز حفل زفاف ولعبة تجهيز حفلة الزفاف و العاب تجهيز حفلة الزفاف والعاب تجهيز حفل الزفاف الهندي ولعبة تجهيز العروس لحفل الزفاف والعاب تجهيز لحفل زفاف، كل هذه الالعاب جمعناها لكم في لعبة واحدة.أيضاً هذه اللعبة سيتم تحديثها أولاً بأول فمثلا اذا نشرت لعبة التجهيز لحفل الزفاف 2019 أو لعبة التجهيز لحفلة الزفاف 2020 سيتم تحديثهم مباشرة على هذه اللعبة، من دون تعب ستحدث اللعبة تلقائية على جوالك. أيضاً كل العاب حفلات الزفاف للعرائس موجودة لدينا، فمثلاً موجود عندنا  لعبة حفلة الزفاف مضحك و لعبة حفل الزفاف لجمع النقود ولعبة حفل الزفاف الازرق لعبة حفل الزفاف الرومانسى و لعبة حفل زفاف و لعبة حفل زفاف الازرق لعبة ديكور حفل الزفاف الرومانسي و لعبة حفل الزفاف تعب قلبي و لعبة حفل الزفاف الملكي و لعبة حفل الزفاف المضحك لعبة حفل زفاف ليلى 2018 لعبة حفل زفاف ليلى 2019 و لعبة حفل زفاف العروسة ليلي 2020 اول ما تنشر ستجدونا حدثناها على الالعاب.والعاب تلبيس بنات، والعاب مكياج بنات الجديدة 2018، ولعبة تلبيس صبايا بنات، والعاب بنات وبس، والعاب ميك اب، والعاب فساتين الزفاف، ولعبة ملابس حفلة ليلية، جميعها ستجدونها في حسابنا.اذا اعجبتكم اللعبة لا تنسو تقييمها خمسة نجوم . وشكراً

description: Experience an awe-inspiring Free MMORPG that lets you control actions in Real-time and embark through a vast fantasy 3D Open World! Immerse yourself into a mmorpg universe of epic atmosphere and darkness through fast gameplay and amplified combat intensity! Meet friends around the world and create Parties to raid treacherous Dungeons or clash Real-time against rivals in the Arena and large-scale PVP Battlegrounds. Gear up stunning Armors, Wings and Mounts to fight against the evil on a Fantasy MMORPG Open World to bring back Glory. Upgrade and transform yourself from warrior to an unstoppable War God!  As the Darkness falls, only the Chosen survive… Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness of Dark 3!▶ WORLDWIDE SERVERS-The Action MMORPG – Dark 3 is now available for 165 countries! Party with friends from all over the globe and conquer enemies in the immersive Open World!▶ CLANS & GUILDS-Group up with friends and guildmates, or party up with thousands of other players around the world to take down epic bosses, engage in mass-scale PvP combat, and uncover loot in epic raid dungeons.▶ REAL-TIME COMBATS-Battle against all who stand in your way! Real-time CO-OP and PVP combat means the action never stops-Beat them UP! Easy to control, one-tap combo and amazing experience▶ ENDLESS CHARACTER PROGRESSION-Choose from wide MMORPG range of heroes: Warrior, Archer or Mage-Uncover powerful ancient relics, upgrade your weapons, unlock new abilities, and customize your gameplay style-Collect Tome and unleash the wrath of War, combining brutal attacks and supernatural abilities  ▶ EXTREME ARSENAL & CUSTOMIZATION-Wield a devastating arsenal of angelic, demonic and Earthly weapons. -Equip your heroes with unique Mounts, Swords, Gears, Weapons and Furious Wings.▶ VISCERAL GAMEPLAY -Challenge Multiplayer Dungeon, Boss World, Urgent Wild and more dynamic quests -Forge powerful alliances to maximize your growth and rally league to defeat rivals-Various PvP modes in Arena:1v1, 2v2, 3v3, Team battle and Alliance War▶ FANTASY OPEN-WORLD -Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer. ▶ OFFLINE AUTO-COMBAT -Upgrade and kill bosses anytime, anywhere, creating a win-win situation for both work and playOfficial Facebook Pagehttps://www.facebook.com/dark3online/Official Website http://dark3.app4gamer.com
descriptionHTML:
Experience an awe-inspiring Free MMORPG that lets you control actions in Real-time and embark through a vast fantasy 3D Open World!

Immerse yourself into a mmorpg universe of epic atmosphere and darkness through fast gameplay and amplified combat intensity! Meet friends around the world and create Parties to raid treacherous Dungeons or clash Real-time against rivals in the Arena and large-scale PVP Battlegrounds. Gear up stunning Armors, Wings and Mounts to fight against the evil on a Fantasy MMORPG Open World to bring back Glory. Upgrade and transform yourself from warrior to an unstoppable War God!

As the Darkness falls, only the Chosen survive…

Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness of Dark 3!

▶ WORLDWIDE SERVERS
-The Action MMORPG – Dark 3 is now available for 165 countries! Party with friends from all over the globe and conquer enemies in the immersive Open World!

▶ CLANS & GUILDS
-Group up with friends and guildmates, or party up with thousands of other players around the world to take down epic bosses, engage in mass-scale PvP combat, and uncover loot in epic raid dungeons.

▶ REAL-TIME COMBATS
-Battle against all who stand in your way! Real-time CO-OP and PVP combat means the action never stops
-Beat them UP! Easy to control, one-tap combo and amazing experience

▶ ENDLESS CHARACTER PROGRESSION
-Choose from wide MMORPG range of heroes: Warrior, Archer or Mage
-Uncover powerful ancient relics, upgrade your weapons, unlock new abilities, and customize your gameplay style
-Collect Tome and unleash the wrath of War, combining brutal attacks and supernatural abilities

▶ EXTREME ARSENAL & CUSTOMIZATION
-Wield a devastating arsenal of angelic, demonic and Earthly weapons.
-Equip your heroes with unique Mounts, Swords, Gears, Weapons and Furious Wings.

▶ VISCERAL GAMEPLAY
-Challenge Multiplayer Dungeon, Boss World, Urgent Wild and more dynamic quests
-Forge powerful alliances to maximize your growth and rally league to defeat rivals
-Various PvP modes in Arena:1v1, 2v2, 3v3, Team battle and Alliance War

▶ FANTASY OPEN-WORLD
-Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer.

▶ OFFLINE AUTO-COMBAT
-Upgrade and kill bosses anytime, anywhere, creating a win-win situation for both work and play

Official Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/dark3online/

Official Website
http://dark3.app4gamer.com
recentChanges: Worldwide Servers now available for 132 Countries! Get ready for Global Guild Wars!
summary: Popular Old-School MMORPG’s back! Prepare yourself and Embrace the Darkness!
title: Dark 3

descriptionHTML:
NEW in the mobile games market! Unique new style and new features!

Such a game you have not seen!

Amazing combination of modern pixel graphics, first person shooter, stickman and zombie with numerous special effects!

Keep the defense inside the house, which storms the bloodthirsty crowd. Survive in this difficult battle! Build a barricade and use numerous weapons (knives, axes, pistols, assault rifles and shotguns).

Watch your back! Achieve maximum success.

In this game you will get:

- Cubic first-person shooter.
- Modern unique locations in pixel style.
- A large arsenal of weapons (from a knife to a machine gun).
- Characters and design, as in Maynkraft.
- Characters in stylistics. Stickman.
- Pixel version of the game Black Ops Zombie.

Features:
- Modern realistic physics.
- Pocket edition, so you can play on the road.
- Dynamic action in confined spaces.
- Craft weapons and cartridges.
- Hardcore bosses.

Technical support:
- The game was created by a professional team of developers with the involvement of specialists in directing and sound.
- The game will be updated on an ongoing basis.
- Leave comments and write to us. Any of your comments will not be left without attention.

Play good games such as Stickman Combat Pixel Edition!

comments: I think it is absolutely adorable, but I noticed it lags on controls. Still will play it though.
Very good for kids

Some mazes not solvable... This is quickly made obvious in "dark mode" which shows the walls on one half of the maze are solid, not allowing you to cross to the other side unless you pass through the home (losing a star or 2, and paws) VERY DISAPPOINTING, how do you even consider allowing unsolvable levels? ... Besides that, graphics are a bit slow (I have 700Mb free RAM before opening the game, should be enough, but still lags) - I wouldn't recommend this for someone who likes to actually solve their levels in games!

description: The breakaway hit Road Drivers: Legacy returns with more dynamic arcade racing road trip. Hop in the sports elite car of your dreams and race down the legendary high speed highways in Road Drivers: Legacy!Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!Road Drivers: Legacy is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world. Endless racing is now redefined!Try cool cars in city!This offline racing adventure challenges you to race, speed and crash your way to victory while you protect your turf and uncover a string of mysterious accidents and deaths in the racing community.Drive via dumb cars, take a long road trip.Sport and Muscle CARSChoose from a selection of 30+ cars from the hottest manufacturers like BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Koenigsegg, Mazda, Nissan SkylineTry out the best game in 2017!KEY FEATURES✭ Stunning 3D graphics✭ Smooth and realistic car handling✭ Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!✭ Detailed environment✭ Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.✭ Basic customization through paint and other✭ Online Leaderboards and AchievementsGAMEPLAY✭ Use steering wheel, accelerometer or game buttons to steer✭ Press brake button to slow down✭ Buy better cars to have better handlingTIPS✭ The faster you drive the more scores you get✭ When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash✭ Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cashAre you ready for the challenge? Show your friends what a speed demon looks like!Road Drivers: Legacy will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
descriptionHTML:
The breakaway hit Road Drivers: Legacy returns with more dynamic arcade racing road trip. Hop in the sports elite car of your dreams and race down the legendary high speed highways in Road Drivers: Legacy!

Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!

Road Drivers: Legacy is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world. Endless racing is now redefined!
Try cool cars in city!

This offline racing adventure challenges you to race, speed and crash your way to victory while you protect your turf and uncover a string of mysterious accidents and deaths in the racing community.
Drive via dumb cars, take a long road trip.
Sport and Muscle CARS
Choose from a selection of 30+ cars from the hottest manufacturers like BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Honda, Infiniti, Jaguar, Koenigsegg, Mazda, Nissan Skyline
Try out the best game in 2017!


KEY FEATURES
✭ Stunning 3D graphics
✭ Smooth and realistic car handling
✭ Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!
✭ Detailed environment
✭ Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
✭ Basic customization through paint and other
✭ Online Leaderboards and Achievements

GAMEPLAY
✭ Use steering wheel, accelerometer or game buttons to steer
✭ Press brake button to slow down
✭ Buy better cars to have better handling

TIPS
✭ The faster you drive the more scores you get
✭ When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
✭ Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash

Are you ready for the challenge? Show your friends what a speed demon looks like!


Road Drivers: Legacy will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
recentChanges: A long-awaited update with cops and shooting!
Just try it out and have fun!
summary: Play the best racing in 2017! Cop pursuits and shooting! Be the best!
title: Road Drivers: Legacy

descriptionHTML:
Knowledge is Power is the companion app you need to play the quiz game full of trivia, tricks and tactics for the PlayStation®4 system.

Challenge your friends and family to a battle of brainpower in this competitive quiz for two to six players.
Use your phone or tablet to answer rapid fire general knowledge questions, compete in touch screen challenges and target your rivals with an arsenal of Power Plays.

Make sure your PS4™ system is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
Choose a character and snap a selfie using fun filters that match the look
Answer quiz questions without your rivals seeing your choice
Choose from a selection of Power Plays and target your closest rivals
Engage in touch screen challenges to be the faster finger on the sofa
Play 'Quick Quiz' using just the app and share your winner’s photo on social media

The application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Russian, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Latin American Spanish, Turkish, Greek, Czech and Hungarian.

PlayLink titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™ system, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. http://playstation.com/playlinkforps4

Please note: This app acts as a controller. PS4™ system, the Knowledge is Power game, and the Knowledge is Power Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and the Knowledge is Power game for the PS4™ system sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use if this app, depending on your country of residence:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-use/op/

description: Formula Car Stunt  Race:The fast cars are back with new stunt racing events on dangerous track.The amazing adventures of formula cars are about to begin. A world class most thrilling track is built just for real car rally. You will be amazed with ultimate fun right inside the clouds. Because, you will be driving fast cars on an impossible track. There are no rules but the mission to survive till the finish line of real car rally. You need to be very careful, as it is a thousand feet fall from the car stunt track.Impossible Race TrackThe missions of drift speed rally game are very interesting. There is a track right in front of you. You will be driving fast formula car on the impossible track. You will be thrilled with the location and real stunt track. You as a car driver stuntman will definitely enjoy the breathtaking height.ChallengesThe gameplay of real car rally is very interesting and mesmerizing. There is a challenge mode for formula car driver with dozens of missions to complete. Each challenge will award the car driver stuntman with achievement prize. Moreover, your rank will also be improved in real car crazy race game.Deadly TrapsThe most important to consider are the traps and hurdles the car driver stuntman will face on the run. The challenge is same every time but the hurdles are different and more difficult to test your amazing car driving skills. Avoid the traps and cross the finish line before time runs out in real car crazy race.Variety of CarsTap on the garage and select your favorite car for drift speed rally. There is a whole variety of race cars and formula cars to choose. But initially you have only one to participate in drift speed rally. You need to complete missions and buy new stunt cars with money you will get. Each car has its own specifications. You need to find the car which suits your car driving well. ControlsThe controls of this game are also very easy. You have buttons to accelerate, stop and steer your car in real car crazy race. There is a camera icon to change view during car driving. The nitro button is there to boost your acceleration in this formula car driver game. There is a horn as well in this game.Best of Luck…!Formula Car Stunt  Race Features:Smooth and easy controls.Multiple models of road cars.Different challenges to complete.Stunning Impossible Track.Real in-game sounds.Realistic 3D graphics.Different camera views.If you have no wifi, you can play formula car stunt  race, absolutely free.So quickly download this interesting game of 2018 offered by AppsValley available on Google Play Store on your android smart phones.
descriptionHTML:
Formula Car Stunt Race:
The fast cars are back with new stunt racing events on dangerous track.
The amazing adventures of formula cars are about to begin. A world class most thrilling track is built just for real car rally. You will be amazed with ultimate fun right inside the clouds. Because, you will be driving fast cars on an impossible track. There are no rules but the mission to survive till the finish line of real car rally. You need to be very careful, as it is a thousand feet fall from the car stunt track.

Impossible Race Track
The missions of drift speed rally game are very interesting. There is a track right in front of you. You will be driving fast formula car on the impossible track. You will be thrilled with the location and real stunt track. You as a car driver stuntman will definitely enjoy the breathtaking height.

Challenges
The gameplay of real car rally is very interesting and mesmerizing. There is a challenge mode for formula car driver with dozens of missions to complete. Each challenge will award the car driver stuntman with achievement prize. Moreover, your rank will also be improved in real car crazy race game.

Deadly Traps
The most important to consider are the traps and hurdles the car driver stuntman will face on the run. The challenge is same every time but the hurdles are different and more difficult to test your amazing car driving skills. Avoid the traps and cross the finish line before time runs out in real car crazy race.

Variety of Cars
Tap on the garage and select your favorite car for drift speed rally. There is a whole variety of race cars and formula cars to choose. But initially you have only one to participate in drift speed rally. You need to complete missions and buy new stunt cars with money you will get. Each car has its own specifications. You need to find the car which suits your car driving well.

Controls
The controls of this game are also very easy. You have buttons to accelerate, stop and steer your car in real car crazy race. There is a camera icon to change view during car driving. The nitro button is there to boost your acceleration in this formula car driver game. There is a horn as well in this game.

Best of Luck…!

Smooth and easy controls.
Multiple models of road cars.

description: Show off your great style with Covet Fashion, the game for the shopping obsessed! Join millions of other fashionistas, discover clothing and brands you love, and get recognized for your style! Feed your shopping addiction and create outfits in this fashion game designed to hone your style skills. Express your unique style by shopping for fabulous items to fill your closet, putting together looks for different Style Challenges and voting on other players’ looks. Plus, win exclusive in-game prizes for looks that earn 4 stars or more!SHOP THE BEST STYLES. We’ve partnered with brands like Calvin Klein, Rachel Zoe and Vince Camuto to bring you the latest fashions to obsess over. With over 175 brands to shop from you’re sure to discover styles you love.STYLE THE PERFECT OUTFIT. Choose from thousands of glamorous clothing and accessory items in addition to chic hair and makeup styles on our new diverse array of models to create looks for various styling challenges such as photo shoots, cocktails and red carpet fittings.VOTE ON WHO WORE IT BEST. Cast your vote and decide what’s hot on the Covet Fashion scene! Over hundreds of thousands of entries per styling challenge! Are other players’ looks 5-star worthy or did they miss the mark?PLAY WITH FRIENDS. Want to get advice on your outfits or celebrate your wins? Join a Fashion House to make friends or connect to Facebook and chat about any and all things Covet Fashion.Did you know you can shop your favorite Covet Fashion items in real life? All of the clothing and accessory items featured in the game link to places where you can buy them for your real-life closet. comments: A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

To many play just to attack your ball after you hit. Regardless if they don't play well they win. A bit eh. The way it's done barely allows you to win. I agree with many others reviews. Something fishy about the scoring system and who you are placed against. Won't keep long if it continues. Could be awesome if it wasn't unfair. O.o

This game is ok at best. More about luck then skill. Fun and addictive, yes at times. Ive collected all the trophies from 3 of the maps and was on a roll. Then out of nowhere a 15 game lose streak. You will get to the point past anger. There are a lot of pretty good/lucky players from around the world.

Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.  EDIT: Game froze on a Pixel XL, cost me lots of coins! Not happy.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads!
